name: Pizza Delivery (LOVEPIZZAINC.)
description:
The Pizzatastic classic is back better than ever! A recreation of Stanley's first adventure made to be as exact as possible, play through 7 levels and deliver dat pizza!

This is a port of Jefftastic's Pizza Delivery (Originally made in the Snap web platform) to the Godot engine, providing an accessible and good way of playing the original game

Wanna play the original? Click here!

Wanna go further and look at the source code? Take a peek here!

Credits:
  • Jefftastic (Coding)
  • Postman (Intro cutscene)
  • Coffee Bat (Soundtrack)

Port by Coffee Bat
